mapper.sql: ID, driver, car_num, telephone, goods_info, goods_num, time, type_id, area_id, goods_id, goods_name, area_name, type_name, weight, date, duty, vessel_voyage
mapper.select:
select
from job_order
date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} and
time != CONCAT(#{startDate},'白班') and
telephone = #{telephone} and
time != CONCAT(#{endDate},'夜班') and
type_Id = #{typeId} and
area_Id = #{areaId} and
goods_Id = #{goodsId} and
order by time,type_Id desc
mapper.insert: insert into job_order (ID, driver, car_num, telephone, goods_info, goods_num, time, type_id, area_id, goods_id, goods_name, area_name, type_name, weight, date, duty, vessel_voyage) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vesselVoyage,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update job_order
driver = #{driver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_num = #{carNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_info = #{goodsInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_num = #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
time = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
date = #{date,jdbcType=DATE},
duty = #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vessel_voyage = #{vesselVoyage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update job_order set driver = #{driver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_num = #{carNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_info = #{goodsInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_num = #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, time = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, date = #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, duty = #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vessel_voyage = #{vesselVoyage,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
